experience.title: Product Manager
experience.description: • Documented tokenomics, Metaverse & its users' functionality and structure which laid the foundation for product development• Researched popular Metaverses like Decentraland, Sandbox, and Roblox functionality & features• Contacted 8 blockchain developers to understand technical needs to build NFT marketplace & crypto wallet; Researched & documented metaverse brand onboarding procedure

experience.title: Product & Strategy
experience.description: • Prepared the data pipeline for the GTM strategy for the launch of SaaS product in the USA market• Led the development of the SaaS product for printing businesses to augment the user experience for flat prints by integrating AR tech• Identified gaps in the SaaS dashboard and led building features across engineering and design• Led the building of 3 Stock Keeping Units of the SaaS platform• Documented the Reward System PRD for  Flam app by collaborating with the development team
